page.title: 19A child's day in Abbotsley
page.content: On Fridays I get up and we have breakfast.We have a bowl of cereal and a slice of toast and marmalade.My dad teaches in Ampthill. He generally goes by car but when mum,who is a part time teacher,goes to work dad goes on the motorbike.We all help to clear the table. We make our own beds while mum does the washing up.Then I go to the bus stop to catch the school bus at 8.20.I get to school at 8.45 and school starts at 9.00.At 3.15 the bus takes the Abbotsley children home.But I go to Football for half an hour then mum takes me home in the car.I have my tea and I go swimming for an hour in Bedford. Then I go home and watch television until bed time.
